column4: Quick question: when installing a printer through a SAMBA network and it asks for the "Host" what do you put? The computer's id, it's location, what?
try the computer's id, it should work

OK I tried the computer's name (which is 'administrator') and now it CLAIMS to see the printer but when I go to "Print a Test Page" it says the page has been sent to printer... but nothing happens :| It doesn't print...
i'm going to try to setup my printer now. can i PM you?
